snippet: Gambling everything, thousands of Haitians have made their way to small towns in the Brazilian Amazon over the past year in a desperate search for work.
abstract: Thousands of Haitians have made their way across the Americas to reach small towns in the Brazilian Amazon in a desperate search for work; latest surge of hundreds arrives amid fears that Brazilian government could slow influx; their improbable journey says as much about the dire economic conditions that persist in Haiti as it does about the rising economic profile of Brazil

byline.contributor: Lis Horta Moriconi and Erika O’Conor contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro.

lead_paragraph: Gambling everything, thousands of Haitians have made their way to small towns in the Brazilian Amazon over the past year in a desperate search for work.

headline.seo: Brazil’s Boom Absorbs Haiti’s Poor, For Now
headline.main: Haitians Take Arduous Path to Brazil, and Jobs
headline.print_headline: Haitians Take Arduous Path to Brazil, and Jobs
